overview: Sensual Moments Vol. 7 brings you four stories of couples having erotic, sensual adventures. A married couple attend a photography workshop, and both find romantic interests in others. A rich woman relaxing at a swanky resort strikes up a sensual moment with one of the fit, young male servers. And another couple finally finds a moment alone at a bed and breakfast, and don't want to plan anything other than fiery, and spontaneous sex.
title: Sensual Moments 7
